attributes.additional_details:
In order to teach the youth of today respect, obedience and hard-work.  We petition for compulsory national service to be reinstated.  Our broken society is clearly evident now more than ever and generations are opting for a life of benefits.

An age range for this to take place could be between 16 and 21 years old.

Matters such as opt-out through illness or disability are clearly matters for later discussion.
